summary: Refactored the .claude/agents directory to transform it from an unused vestige into an active workflow component by implementing auto-invocation hooks. Redundant agents were purged while core agents were strengthened and new ones added to handle specific tasks like architecture and security automatically.
key_decisions: Implemented auto-invocation hooks to trigger agents automatically based on events rather than manual user calls.
Deleted redundant agents (council-advisor, critic, runner) that simply wrapped existing scripts.
Expanded agent capabilities by adding new specific agents like 'architect' and 'security'.
